house_listing.house_description: To be built. Have it your way. Your plans or ours. Own a fine homearama quality show piece in this fine secluded neighborhood. Just steps to the water. This is a ground floor opportunity in a paradise like community.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Foyer, Walk-In Closet(s), Wet Bar
